name: copper
description: Copper is a soft, reddish metal prized for its conductivity and malleability. It has been a staple in crafting and electrical applications across civilizations for centuries.

allomancy.description: Creates a 'coppercloud' around {PAWN} that hides any Investiture-related activity.

feruchemy.description: Stores memories, allowing perfect recall of stored knowledge.

store.description: This pawn is storing memories in a copper metalmind, causing their thoughts to blur. Learning slows, task focus falters, and they struggle to retain information — all sacrificed in the name of long-term clarity.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping a copper metalmind, unlocking stored memories with razor-sharp clarity. Their mind is focused, efficient, and highly receptive — making research, learning, and complex tasks faster and easier.
